text: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel is a 2011 British comedy-drama movie starring Judi Dench and Maggie Smith. It is based on the novel These Foolish Things. John Madden is the director. This comedy-drama got very good reviews from critics. It was a box office hit. It made over $134 million worldwide. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:2011 comedy-drama movies Category:2011 LGBT movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:English-language movies Category:LGBT comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in Asia Category:Rajasthan Category:Movies directed by John Madden
title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
